EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202212-HP-ENT-SWBR-AHIP-Webinar.Follow Up Attendee
EmailTemplate.subject: Recording now available for our webinar on managing multiple chronic conditions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Integrating Virtual Care for Consumers Managing Multiple Chronic Conditions Webinar
We hope you enjoyed our recent webinar, Integrating Virtual Care for Consumers Managing Multiple Chronic Conditions. We recorded the presentation and have it available for you to access anytime. Feel free to watch, share and reach out to us to discuss these findings and see how connected care can seamlessly integrate into your organization.
Watch on demand <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/webinar/integrating-virtual-care-for-consumers-managing-multiple-chronic-conditions]]>
Learn about: New research on how people with multiple chronic conditions seek and manage care The impact of mental health challenges on condition management Consumer attitudes toward virtual care within various populations How virtual health can help prevent care fragmentation
Speakers
Michael Kobernick, MD Senior Medical Director Blue Cross Blue Shield of Michigan
Glen Davis, MD, MBA Vice President, Clinical Programs Teladoc Health
Hunter Sinclair (Moderator) Vice President, Solution Strategy Teladoc Health
About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
